Text: FW Letter of Confirmation re BF Capital Funding LPis the detail we have on Bow River Trust Forwarded by Catherine ClarkHOUECT on AM McArthur Ian IAN OYALBANKCOM on PM To cc McArthur Ian IAN OYALBANKCOM Fleming Blair BLAIR OYALBANKCOM Subject FW Letter of Confirmation re BF Capital Funding LP FYI confirmation that the wording is OK for BF Capital Await comments from Enron or confirmation that you are also OK Thanks Mike Original Message From Tomlinson Ross Sent September PM To McArthur Ian Subject RE Letter of Confirmation re BF Capital Funding LP Sensitivity Private Ian wording is fine I have confirmed that the signatories would be Bruce Barker and David Smith in Calgary Ross Original Message From McArthur Ian Sent Monday September PM To cris nroncom Cc Tomlinson Ross McArthur Ian Fleming Blair Subject Letter of Confirmation re BF Capital Funding LP Importance High Sensitivity Private Cris as discussed BF Equity Capital would be prepared to issue the letter for audit purposes and we would propose the following text Please advise comments asap Quote To Whom it May Concern Re BF Capital Funding LP We confirm that BF Capital Funding LP is an active investment vehicle owned by the General Partner IFS Alberta Ltd which is in turn owned by IFS Inc an Ontario corporation owned by a number of legal professionals BF Funding LP has previously undertaken and will continue to make a number of equity investments and in the proposed transaction will be purchasing of the equity interest in Bow River Trust a trust existing under the laws of Alberta For Canadian GAAP purposes the General Partner of BF Capital Funding LP will be required to consolidate Bow River Trust back into its accounts for financial reporting purposes A Limited Partner interest in BF Capital Funding is held by Royal Bank of Canada under Section of the Bank Act As Limited Partner Royal Bank of Canada has no control over BF Capital Funding LP and is not required to consolidate the partnership into its accounts for financial reporting purposes Yours faithfully Bruce Barker SW Bowen Unquote Please advise comments asap Please respond to Ian McArthur email address Regards Mike Elllison RBC Dominion Securities

Alberta prepay conference call at pm Houston time Cc for the conference call this evening at pm Houston time Call in number USA Canada Pass Code If you have difficulties accessing the conference call please call Kim Zachary at

TIME CHANGE Alberta prepay conference call at pm Houston time Cc to push the conference call back to Houston time Forwarded by Catherine ClarkHOUECT on PM Enron Global Finance From Catherine Clark PM To IAN OYALBANKCOM BLAIR OYALBANKCOM cc Brian CT Soma CT Sara CT Tana CT Derek CT Greg CT Peter CT Kim CT Cris CT Subject Alberta prepay conference call at pm Houston time Same numbers for the conference call this evening at pm Houston time Call in number USA Canada Pass Code If you have difficulties accessing the conference call please call Kim Zachary at
Alberta prepay conference call at am Houston timein information US Canada pass code
Alberta prepay conference call at pm Houston time Cc call is for a statuscheck on the Alberta prepay Both the US and Canada should call Participant code Dial at any time for operator assistance
Alberta prepay call at am Houston time on MONDAY in number participant code

Re ChaseCanadian PrepayForwarded by Catherine ClarkHOUECT on PM on PM To cc Subject Re ChaseCanadian Prepay I understand that the Floating Price Calculation and some other points may have changed Pls resend on PM To Jeffrey W HASE cc Subject ChaseCanadian Prepay Forwarded by Catherine ClarkHOUECT on AM From Tana Jones on PM To Brian CT Soma CT Peter CT Greg CT Catherine CT William S CT cc Subject ChaseCanadian Prepay Attached please the proposed forms of Confirmation with respect to the referenced transaction Please call me or Sara Shackleton if you have any comments or questions See attached file ENACHASEnymexdocSee attached file ENACHASEnymexdoc ENACHASEnymexdoc ENACHASEnymexdoc

Re swap details on Alberta prepayForwarded by Catherine ClarkHOUECT on PM on PM To cc Subject Re swap details on Alberta prepay Im not available at that time Pls amend your sample confirm after the call and send by email on PM To TIM BCDSCOM Jeffrey W HASE cc Subject swap details on Alberta prepay There seems to be some confusion surrounding the details of the various swaps Please bring any outstanding issues to the following conference call at pm Houston time Call in numbers in Canada access code in Canada in the US access code in the US Please call Megan Angelos at if you have any trouble accessing the call Thanks Catherine

TD volumesForwarded by Catherine ClarkHOUECT on AM Enron Global Finance From Catherine Clark PM To Jonathan CT cc John nron Soma CT Brian CT Sara CT Subject TD volumes Jon Im attaching TDs volumes in GJs for swap with Enron Canada The fixed price is Just to be clear these are how the volumes add up GJ GJ GJ GJ Jeff can you size up the fixed price for the swap between ENA and Chase to reflect your spread on the above volumes John you can use the same volumes but at the price you get from Jeff which you will pass on to Enron Canada in our internal swap I will email you RBCs volumes as soon as I confirm that they have locked in an interest rate their volumes will be slightly different from TDs Please call me with any questions Thanks Catherine PS TD has links to other databases embedded in this spreadsheet Before opening in Excel go to a blank sheet and set to manual calculation go to Tools then Options Forwarded by Catherine ClarkHOUECT on PM on PM To cc Subject Final final version I hope See attached file Enron IRSxls Enron IRSxls

RBC volumesForwarded by Catherine ClarkHOUECT on AM Enron Global Finance From Catherine Clark PM To Jonathan CT John nron cc Soma CT Brian CT Sara CT Subject RBC volumes Jon Im attaching RBCs volumes in GJs for swap with Enron Canada Same fixed price of as in the TD swap Jeff just like the previous email can you size up the fixed price for the swap between ENA and Chase to reflect your spread on the attached volumes John you can use the attached volumes but at the price you get from Jeff which you will pass on to Enron Canada in our internal swap Please call me with any questions Thanks Catherine Forwarded by Catherine ClarkHOUECT on PM Hirasawa Tim on PM To Hirasawa Tim Fleming Blair BLAIR OYALBANKCOM cc Aloisio John Kassis Maher Subject RE Commodity Swap Volumes FINAL SWAP VOLUMES Gas Swap Calc xls Gas Swap Calc xls

ENext Equipment Cc Louise Lisa Bills asked me to send you a list of the equipment currently in ENext Generation LLC with the amounts paid to date and future payment obligations Please call me with any questions Catherine x

Austin Project Purchase OptionForwarded by Catherine ClarkHOUECT on AM Taylor Rob on PM To cc Subject Austin Project Purchase Option Attached is a revised draft of the Purchase Option Assignment and Assumption Agreement for the LMs to be used in the Austin Project The attached reflects the comments of Winston Strawn Also attached is an execution copy of the agreement Serial numbers and other identifying information should be inserted on Schedule to the agreement prior to execution Please call me if you have any questions or comments Regards Rob Taylor Andrews Kurth LLP Travis Street Suite Houston Texas Tel Fax email This email is privileged and confidential and is intended only for the recipients named above If you are not the intended recipient please i do not read copy use or disclose the contents hereof to others any of the foregoing being strictly prohibited ii notify the sender immediately of your receipt hereof and iii delete this email and all copies of it Purchase Option AssignmentAssumptionDOC PO Austin CompareDOC AssumptionDOC PO Austin CompareDOC

Austin Turbine TakeOut from West LB Cc Purchase Option Assignment and Assumption Agreement for Austin turbines Ive added the equipment description in Schedule and changed the date of the agreement to November see attached redlined version BenEric can you verify that my unit numbers in Schedule match your list of unit numbers David can you sign off on this for accounting Once we have signoff from accounting we can circulate the document once more with Winston Strawn Hopefully it should be in pretty good shape by tomorrow Thanks Catherine x
Form of Purchase Option NoticeHere is a form of the notice that needs to go out to the ENext Generation lenders

chg order to blue dog contract Cc my comments by redlining Change Order to the Blue Dog turbine contract The main points were to replace EECC with ENA as the Agent to ENext Generation LLC and to have days to pay the invoice The ENext Generation payment process is to receive ONE advance each month on the th therefore I could not guarantee payment within days of receipt of invoice Catherine x Original Message From Barto Brian Sent Thursday February AM To Clark Catherine Mann Kay Subject Catherine Lisa phoned me and said she would give you a heads up that this second change order needed review and quick turn around Coincidentally Kay Mann is reviewing change order and will be looking into the change from LJM to ENext Generation language implications Hopefully the comments on one will apply to the other Suggest you call Kay straight away to save time I am attaching both for your convenience I look forward to you comments By the way Kay GE is looking it over right now too and Scott Dieball has been asked to review I Scotts review is not necessary please let me know File CORdoc File CORdoc

RE Change Order Blue Dog Cc look fine When do you plan to execute Accounting Jody Pierces group needs to know when funds must go out to GE Original Message From Mann Kay Sent Monday April PM To Bills Lisa Clark Catherine Engeldorf Roseann Manis Herman Subject Change Order Blue Dog We have requested changes at NorthWesterns request Please advise if there are any problems Kay Forwarded by Kay MannCorpEnron on PM From Chris Booth PM To cc Ben CT Kay nron Subject Change Order Jeff Please review the attached change order regarding storage for Unit I will call to discuss Chris File CORdoc

Addresses for Delta ClosingDelta turbine purchase out of ENext Please send executed signature pages to Karl Wiemer Milbank Tweed Hadley McCloy LLP Chase Manhattan Plaza New York NY Wilmington Trust will sign for ENext Generation LLC however this must be done in the state of Delaware so please send the signature pages to Jose Mercado Ann Roberts and Doneene Damon both get copies of the documents to review but not sign Ann Roberts Wilmington Trust Madison Ave rd Floor New York NY Phone Fax Doneene Damon Richards Layton Finger PA One Rodney Square King Street Wilmington DE Phone Fax Jose Mercado Wilmington Trust Company Rodney Square North North Market Street Wilmington DE Phone Fax Hope this gives you all the addresses you need Please let me know if you need anything else Catherine

RE Prepayment Notice Formremoved Shazia Sarkers information and added Elizabeth Burnett our new Administrative Agent at CSFB Original Message From Engeldorf Roseann Sent Thursday April AM To Mann Kay Clark Catherine Subject Prepayment Notice Form See attached File Prepayment Notice for Phase I PropertyDOC Thanks Rose

RE Letter to GE Payment of Invoices Cc with the numbers as well Original Message From Walker Rebecca Sent Wednesday May PM To Booth Chris Cc Clark Catherine Edmonds Marcus Vos Theresa Dennis Tonya Jacoby Ben Mann Kay Subject Re Letter to GE Payment of Invoices Chris According to my calculations all of these numbers are correct Regards Rebecca From Chris Booth PM To Rebecca nron Catherine nronXGate cc Ben CT Kay nron Subject Letter to GE Payment of Invoices Ladies Please review the attached letter that I plan on sending to General Electric regarding the payment of recent invoices I would like to obtain your concurrence on the amounts that I have set forth in the letter Thanks Chris File GE Letter May Payment of Invoicesdoc

FW Salmon againHere is a PDF file with the Delta documents Originals will follow shortly Catherine x Original Message From ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESKWiemermilbankEcom NRONcom Sent Thursday May AM To Clark Catherine Subject Salmon again It would help for me to attach the file I suppose salmon ener docsPDF Karl Wiemer Milbank Tweed Hadley McCloy LLP One Chase Manhattan Plaza New York NY fax This email message may contain legally privileged andor confidential information If you are not the intended recipients or the employee or agent responsible for delivery of this message to the intended recipients you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this email message is strictly prohibited If you have received this message in error please immediately notify the sender and delete this email message from your computer salmon ener docsPDF

FW Salmon Energy LLCThis is the last set of emails exchanged re Delta docs Feel free to call Tam to check on the status Tam is a woman Catherine Original Message From Clark Catherine Sent Thursday May PM To ENRON Subject RE Salmon Energy LLC For Salmon Energy GE and Enron please send the documents to me and Ill get them to the correct legal counsel For Wilmington Trust please send to the address below for notarization I guess you can also send him executed documents and he can forward to his counsel Jose Mercado Wilmington Trust Company Rodney Square North North Market Street Wilmington DE Phone Fax Thanks Catherine Original Message From ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESTPhammilbankEcom NRONcom Sent Thursday May PM To Clark Catherine Subject Salmon Energy LLC Catherine I am helping Karl put together execution documents for the various parties My question to you is who should the Assignment and Assumtion Agreement and the Bill of Sale go to at Salmon Energy LLC GE Packaged Power and Wilmington Trust Company I will send you the originals for Enron and ENext In addition the signature for ENext by WTC was not notarized on the Bill of Sale I will send it back to them for notarization but will need to know who to send it to Your assistance would be greatly appreciated Best regards Tam T T Pham Milbank Tweed Hadley McCloy LLP One Chase Manhattan Plaza New York NY tel fax This email message may contain legally privileged andor confidential information If you are not the intended recipients or the employee or agent responsible for delivery of this message to the intended recipients you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this email message is strictly prohibited If you have received this message in error please immediately notify the sender and delete this email message from your computer

RE Northwestern Cc The documents give us a choice between paying the Remaining Purchase Amount Refund Amount million to the LLC or paying the GE Accelerated Payment to GE As you know cash is extremely tight at the moment have we done all we can to negotiate a lower payoff amount with GE The Remaining Purchase Amount Refund Amount allows us to deduct interest a benefit of Can GE give us any discount in excess of If so we should opt for the GE Accelerated Payment We can discuss this further tomorrow Catherine x Original Message From Jacoby Ben Sent Wednesday November PM To Mann Kay Booth Chris Clark Catherine Subject Northwestern Mike Young from NW called to advise me that they received GEs consent NW plans to send us notice of this tomorrow I believe this will trigger our obligation to pay NW the balance of payments we hold discounted at pa I believe this means that we will need to pay NW million of the million we have been prepaid Lets talk about this in the AM

Ian Fleming Blair Subject Letter of Confirmation re BF Capital Funding LP Importance High Sensitivity Private Cris as discussed BF Equity Capital would be prepared to issue the letter for audit purposes and we would propose the following text Please advise comments asap Quote To Whom it May Concern Re BF Capital Funding LP We confirm that BF Capital Funding LP is an active investment vehicle owned by the General Partner IFS Alberta Ltd which is in turn owned by IFS Inc an Ontario corporation owned by a number of legal professionals BF Funding LP has previously undertaken and will continue to make a number of equity investments and in the proposed transaction will be purchasing of the equity interest in Bow River Trust a trust existing under the laws of Alberta For Canadian GAAP purposes the General Partner of BF Capital Funding LP will be required to consolidate Bow River Trust back into its accounts for financial reporting purposes A Limited Partner interest in BF Capital Funding is held by Royal Bank of Canada under Section of the Bank Act As Limited Partner Royal Bank of Canada has no control over BF Capital Funding LP and is not required to consolidate the partnership into its accounts for financial reporting purposes Yours faithfully Bruce Barker SW Bowen Unquote Please advise comments asap Please respond to Ian McArthur email address Regards Mike
